alert.note: Alert for Rains (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued May 05 at 12:22PM CDT until May 05 at 3:45PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 330 PM CDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Delta, Hopkins, Hunt and Rains Counties. * WHEN...Until 330 PM CDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas including water flows over low-water crossings and ponding water on roadways. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Greenville, Sulphur Springs, Commerce, Royse City, Farmersville, Cooper, West Tawakoni, Wolfe City, Quinlan, Caddo Mills, Emory, East Tawakoni, Celeste, Cumby, Como, Campbell, Hawk Cove, Cooper Lake Park South Sulphur, Cooper Lake Park Doctors Creek and Point.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
